title: Research scenario set Unit 1 - inferring cause

content.question: Which of the following elements of Dr. Keith’s research would most strengthen Dr. Keith’s ability to infer a causal relationship between caffeine intake and improved focus and attention?

choices.label: Dr. Keith selects a random sample of students in the class.
Dr. Keith gains approval from an Institutional Review Board.
Dr. Keith keeps conditions the same between the two groups except for the independent variable.
Dr. Keith debriefs the students at the end of the study.

content.answer: Dr. Keith keeps conditions the same between the two groups except for the independent variable.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
